author: holiman
content: I've made a PR to add support for 'Sepolia' - the new PoW testnet which <@!206016661470314496> was collecting addresses for earlier. https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/23730 -- does this look ok for other client devs? Please thumb up if so. There's a miner running, so there should be a couple of days of blocks to sync. cc <@&836981603216654336> <@&688101493978562687> <@&652918665943056397>

author: vorot93
content: I take it Ropsten will go offline soon?

author: vorot93
content: If only we could also reset Goerli and Rinkeby to get rid of Constantinople

author: holiman
content: Well, ropsten isn't being actively maintained by "us" -- I guess it will stay online as long as people mine on it

author: vorot93
content: might as well remove chainspec for it from the code

author: holiman
content: Sooner or later, yes, but not immediately. Let's give projects/people some time to migrate over first
